summary: A small addition to Anga's Mill
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff][size=6][center][font=Georgia]Anga's Mill - ClefJ Edition[/font][size=3]

[/size][/center][/size][/color][center][size=3]Some on the Nexus have requested I do what I had done with Half Moon Mill, and expand a small bit on this mill here in the Pale. It's a beautiful location! All I have done here is add an [color=#1e84cc]Alto Winery [/color](with free traveler's beds), and a [color=#1e84cc]Wizard's shop[/color], along with a border wall and guard, and some minor details. Fully navmeshed and cleaned with Tes5Edit.

The mill remains rather spartan; No elaborate setup like a blacksmith or general goods trader. The mill seems to be a real border outpost between the Pale and Eastmarch, but there's enough of an economy for trade between it, Windhelm and Winterhold.

Please let me know how this version plays. Everything is made with vanilla assets, and contains only a single esp. Stay tuned! [/size]

[color=#00ffff]Requirements:[/color]
- Skyrim and Update
- Dawnguard (for a few resources, more to come in a later version)

[color=#ff0000]Incompatibilities:[/color]
- Any mod that might modify the immediate region of Anga's Mill[/center]
author: ClefJ
